main event: A Navy pilot sighted an object the size of a silver dollar hovering motionlessly at an estimated altitude of over 60,000 feet for about 10 minutes on January 28, 1958.
interesting points: The object was reported to be silver in color, The sighting was documented as part of Project Blue Book, The pilot observed the object while flying, The object maintained its position relative to the jet aircraft during the sighting, The sighting occurred approximately 30 miles north of Monterey, California.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object size of a silver dollar
